features.title: Complete note editor with rich text options

accordions.title: MERN stack
accordions.content: MERN stack is a combination of four powerful web development technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js..

accordions.title: Node.js
accordions.content: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to build server-side applications using JavaScript.

accordions.title: REACT,REACT NEXT.JS
accordions.content: . React also enables building applications with high performance and scalability, making it a popular choice for building complex web applications..
